items.textSnippet: The amenities are great but sometimes the trash valet is a bit late and leaves bags in the hallway for too long.
Love the pool! Only complaint is the dumpster area gets a bit messy on weekends.
Great place but the trash pick up is inconsistent. Sometimes they come at 8pm, sometimes not until 11pm.
Maintenance is fast, but the trash service needs work. Hallways smell because bags sit out too long.
